creator: jwoehr@absolute-performance.com
text: I recently attempted to run patch.xml against a tree including a file which included the following comment line in a comment block to a method: * ${ without a closing Patch.xml bombed as follows: BUILD FAILED /usr/local/src/apache/apache_src/ant/patch.xml:53: Syntax error in property: > * ${ without a closing

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
Sorry for taking soo long to look at this.
I tried with adding the offending line to a file
and did not see the problem.

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text: No response, and test does not reproduce the problem, closing
